entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Showers beginning in the evening then changing to 30 percent chance of rain after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
